metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20657 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: The demangle_template function in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.31.1, has a memory leak via a crafted string,leading to a denial of service (memory consumption), as demonstrated bycxxfilt, a related issue to CVE-2018-12698.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
